formatted_address: #06-00 Bugis Cube，470 north bridge road, Singapore 188735
name: HaveFun Karaoke (Bugis Cube)

reviews.text:
Great service from the crew and team. My first time in a long time and they have strong product knowledge & helped with our decision! Thank you and we will be back! Love it had a great time and great experience

Lovely rooms
Paul was really commendable. He ensured that my tribe and I were all very well taken care of even though I was just another customer on a busy PH day… Thank you all so much!

Always an enjoyable time with the staffs and their strive to make every session a memorable one especially the long time staff Andy and his colleagues Johnathan and Doreamon! Andy and his colleagues have always go beyond and amaze us with his and their service and hosting profession to make sure we always enjoy our K sessions! Very lively bunch and great team work and leadership!

Do not recommend, place is in a shabby mall and service is not very good, short hair lady kept rushing to pay quickly and started the time before paying fully. Spotify and youtube does not work. Connection is very bad even after wifi was provided. Microphone was out of battery after a few minutes of use. The cups for the free drinks were left out in the open, not sure how clean it was so did not take

place definitely not clean, saw a small roach on the wall. choosing songs is easy which made the experience a lot better, room is spacious. only thing is the price point, a bit expensive. why am I paying service charge ah?
